title: Handling a shock diagnosis with Drew Harrisberg
description:
In Episode #158, a Wednesday Wisdoms episode, we hear from my good friend Drew Harrisberg on why being diagnosed with chronic disease in his early 20's has turned out to be a blessing in disguise.

Drew is authentic, uplifting and super inspiring - hope you enjoy it.

Resources:
This is a condensed audio clip taken from episode from Episode #62.
Other episodes with Drew include 83, 100, 110 & 121
Follow Drew on Instagram
